original_text: Anyone who believes in Jesus, the Son of God, will know that what God says is true. But anyone who does not believe God is saying that God tells lies. He does not believe the message that God has told us clearly about his Son.
korean_text: 하나님의 아들을 믿는 자는 자기 안에 증거가 있고 하나님을 믿지 아니하는 자는 하나님을 거짓말하는 자로 만드나니 이는 하나님께서 그 아들에 대하여 증언하신 증거를 믿지 아니하였음이라

sentences.original_text: will know that what God says is true
sentences.korean_translation: 하나님께서 말씀하신 것이 참인 것을 알 것입니다

sentences.original_text: But anyone who does not believe God
is saying that God tells lies
He does not believe the message
that God has told us clearly
